name: Between the Lines (JUSTCAMH)
description:
Platform through the magical journal of an interdimensional explorer.

Manipulate text to create platforms and protect yourself from projectiles. 

A game made by JUSTCAMH
with voice acting by BigPotato

Made for Mini Jam 77, in three and a half days.

Arrows + Space to move
Escape to pause
Any letter (a-z) to move the world
Ctrl+shift+[ or ] to navigate between levels
